Description: Ocean Geoloop AS is a Norway-based green tech company. The Company develops and industrializes green technologies with global scaling potential. The company was established as an offshoot of the research project Ocean, initiated by Hans Gude Gudesen in 2006. Ocean GeoLoop is based on long-term systematic research and method development, connected in a holistic concept with the aim of solving the greatest challenges of time a combined climate, environment and resource crisis.

Author: Emilie Solberg
Lene Marita Berg Hermann
Katrine Nordanger Mjelde
TDN Direkt
Katrine Nordanger Mjelde
Kahni Ismail
Title: Yara og Ocean Geoloop inngår intensjonsavtale om karbonfangst og elektrisitetsproduksjon
